name: Sensory Overload (agent30632)
description:
Introduction

You take control of a little eyeball monster, the main character. You’ve recently woken up in a laboratory and you don’t really like it there, so you must escape!

Gameplay

As a botched lab experiment, some of your motor functions are a little wonky. At any given time, you will only be able to access one of your senses. 

Sight

You will be able to see a limited area around your immediate surroundings, and a vision cone that goes slightly further. Keep your eyes peeled for items that can help you.

Hearing

Pings can be sent out and will outline physical objects within a certain range, similar to echolocation. This ability has a cooldown. Pay attention and you might find something useful! 

Smell

Smells in the environment will have visual indicators that you can see, much like a heatmap. Follow these smells and you may find something of interest...

Credits

Developers: Zhenyang Cai, Steven Van, Dominic Trinh
